com.mcc.ul
Class CioInfo

java.lang.Object
  com.mcc.ul.CioInfo

public class CioInfo
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides methods to retrieve information about a counter I/O subsystem on a DAQ device. To create an instance of this class, call the getInfo() method of the CioDevice class.

hasPacer

public boolean hasPacer()
Returns true if the counter subsystem supports paced operations.
